Plot:
1995. Afghanistan. Russian cargo plane forced to put on the airfield in the capital of Islamic terrorism - the city of Kandahar. Five Russian pilots captured by the Taliban fanatics. They will spend 378 days in hell. How not to betray the motherland? How not to abandon their faith? How to stay yourself? The answer is one - escape...
